pd.fiit.subtitlenet
Class MethodWrapper

java.lang.Object
  pd.fiit.subtitlenet.MethodWrapper

public final class MethodWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

using XML-RPC class to easily wrap methods to communicate with OpenSubtitles.org server
